verbose_text: The corresponding CpG site of MIR596 was cg09899173, located in chr8 :1764328-1765171. Using the miRWalk2 tool and the identified DMR related genes, it was found that 14 target genes of hsa-miR-596 were differentially methylated in the MSC samples of the AML patients, including PM20D1 and cytochrome P450 family 1 subfamily B member 1 (CYP1B1).
evidence: methylated in the MSC samples of the AML patients, including PM20D1
